Parameters: int: Conversion status. Must be one of the status code constants defined above.
byte: Converted data. It can be null.
int: Offset value for appending the header and body signature.
DrmConvertedStatus(int,byte[],int).Description: Creates a DrmConvertedStatus object with the specified parameters.
DrmConvertedStatus(int,byte[],int).FullName: public DrmConvertedStatus (int statusCode, byte[] convertedData, int offset)

Parameters: int: Conversion status. Must be one of the status code constants defined above.
byte: Converted data. It can be null.
int: Offset value for appending the header and body signature.
DrmConvertedStatus(int, byte[], int).Description: Creates a DrmConvertedStatus object with the specified parameters.
DrmConvertedStatus(int, byte[], int).FullName: public DrmConvertedStatus (int statusCode, byte[] convertedData, int offset)

ClassDesc: An entity class that wraps converted data, conversion status, and the offset for appending the header and body signature to the converted data. An instance of this class may be created two ways by the drm framework: a) a call to @B_android#drm#DrmManagerClient#convertData_E@ and b) a call to @B_android#drm#DrmManagerClient#closeConvertSession_E@. An valid offset value is provided only from a success call to @B_android#drm#DrmManagerClient#closeConvertSession_E@.
